exmls.content:
<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameBeginBtnSkin" width="480"  xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  height="800">
	<e:Panel id="btn_group" x="0" y="-176" height="0" width="0" enabled="true">
		<e:Button id="game_begin_btn" x="85" y="540" width="300" height="270" enabled="true">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="camera_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image source="enter_text_png" x="113" y="707" width="130" height="80" touchEnabled="false"/>
	</e:Panel>
	<e:Group id="camera_effect" height="0" x="0" y="-142">
		<e:Image id="camera_effect1" source="camera_effect1_png" x="17" y="661" width="55" height="46"/>
		<e:Image id="camera_effect2" source="camera_effect2_png" x="399" y="703" width="55" height="46"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="hand_group" height="0" width="0" x="0" y="-144">
		<e:Button id="game_begin_hand_btn" x="148" y="700" width="150" height="250">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="hand_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:layout>
			<e:BasicLayout/>
		</e:layout>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameBeginSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="game_begin_bg" source="game_begin_bg_jpg" x="0" y="0" width="480" height="800" alpha="1"/>
	<e:Image id="game_begin_stars" source="stars_png" y="0" width="480" height="800" alpha="1" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group height="0" width="0" y="-70" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Label id="game_begin_text0" y="220" textColor="0x00FFF6" text="欢迎来到疯子世界，" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="28" x="-114"/>
		<e:Label y="270" textColor="0x00FFF6" text="一起分裂 分裂 " fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="28" id="game_begin_text1" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="game_begin_text2" y="320" textColor="0x00FFF6" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="28" text="不停分裂 ······" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GamElementSkin" width="100" height="150" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="group_egg1" height="0" width="0" verticalCenter="0" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Image id="tip_wrong_egg1" y="-65" horizontalCenter="0" source="point_0_png"/>
		<e:Button id="element_egg1" y="-14" horizontalCenter="0" width="60" height="85">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="egg1_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_egg2" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="0" height="0" x="10" y="10">
		<e:Image id="tip_wrong_egg2" y="-60" horizontalCenter="0" source="point_reduce_1_png"/>
		<e:Button id="element_egg2" horizontalCenter="0" y="-16" width="58" height="85">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="egg2_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay2" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_camera1" y="20" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="0" height="0" x="20">
		<e:Image id="tip_right_camera1" y="-65" horizontalCenter="0" source="ponit_2_png"/>
		<e:Button id="element_camera1" y="-21" horizontalCenter="0" width="59" height="90">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="camera1_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="group_camera2" y="30" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" width="0" height="0" x="30">
		<e:Image id="tip_right_camera2" y="-65" horizontalCenter="0" source="ponit_2_png"/>
		<e:Button id="element_camera2" horizontalCenter="0" y="-18" width="89" height="89">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="camera2_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameLoadingSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="loadingBar" x="71" width="320" source="loading_png" verticalCenter="0.5"/>
	<e:Image id="loadingBG" source="loadingBG_png" width="350" height="36" horizontalCenter="0" y="381"/>
	<e:Label id="loadingText" text="100%" x="333" y="355" fontFamily="Consolas雅黑" size="25"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameOverSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image width="440" height="640" y="100" source="game_over_bg_jpg" x="20"/>
	<e:Group height="0" width="0" y="-40" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Label text="蛤？你的分裂数值为             分！" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="24" bold="true" y="224" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Label id="game_total_tip" y="289" text="啧啧~你弱爆了喂~" fontFamily="微软雅黑" bold="true" size="24" horizontalCenter="0" textColor="0x104CD8"/>
		<e:Label text="还想更华丽的分裂吗？" horizontalCenter="0" y="340" fontFamily="微软雅黑" size="20" textColor="0x00FFF6"/>
		<e:Label y="390" textColor="0x00FFF6" text="快来疯子的“e世界”总部抓我啊，" fontFamily="微软雅黑" horizontalCenter="0" size="20" x="10"/>
		<e:Label y="440" textColor="0x00FFF6" text="3天后，新的分裂游戏等你来磨！" fontFamily="微软雅黑" horizontalCenter="0" size="20" x="20"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="game_total_group" height="0" width="0" x="5" y="-40">
		<e:Image source="total_0_png" y="205" x="277" width="26" height="52" id="num0"/>
		<e:Image id="num1" source="total_3_png" x="294" y="205" width="26" height="52"/>
		<e:Image id="num2" source="total_0_png" x="308" y="205" width="26" height="52"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group height="0" width="0" x="0" y="650">
		<e:Image id="game_tower" source="game_tower_png" width="220" height="354" horizontalCenter="239" y="-177"/>
		<e:Image id="lighting_left" source="lighting_left_png" width="140" height="77" x="12" y="-32"/>
		<e:Image id="lighting_right" y="-174" x="305" width="155" height="90" source="lighting_right_png"/>
		<e:Image id="dianbo_1" source="dianbo_png" x="246" y="-198" width="26" height="30"/>
		<e:Image id="dianbo_2" source="dianbo_png" width="26" y="-204" height="30" x="248"/>
		<e:Image id="dianbo_3" source="dianbo_png" width="26" y="-208" height="30" x="250"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GamePlayBGSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="game_border_png" y="100" width="440" height="640" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image id="game_play_mask" y="102" width="440" height="635" source="game_border_jpg" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="game_play_bgs" height="0" width="0" y="0" x="240">
		<e:Image y="103" width="432" height="640" id="game_play_bg0" horizontalCenter="0" source="game_bg_jpg"/>
		<e:Image id="game_play_bg1" source="game_bg_jpg" y="737" width="432" height="640" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="game_bg_jpg" y="-532" width="432" height="640" id="game_play_bg2" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="btn_start" y="573" horizontalCenter="0">
		<e:Button id="btn_start_small" width="150" height="75" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_start_small_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="btn_start_big" width="150" height="75" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_start_big_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RestartPageSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="grey_bg_png" scale9Grid="22,18,132,109" width="440" height="640" horizontalCenter="0" y="100"/>
	<e:Group height="0" width="0" x="137" y="285">
		<e:Button id="restart_btn" width="280" height="40" y="0" x="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="restart_btn_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image source="restart_hand_png" x="-70" y="-5"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group width="0" y="421" height="0" x="137">
		<e:Button id="gameover_btn" y="0" width="280" height="40" x="0">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="gameover_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Image source="restart_hand_png" y="-5" x="-70"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSoundBGSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Image source="game_grids_bg_png" y="0" fillMode="repeat" width="480" height="800" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group id="btn_sound" y="29" width="0" height="0" x="425">
		<e:Button id="btn_sound_on" y="0" x="0" width="35" height="50">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="sound_on_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
		<e:Button id="btn_sound_off" x="0" width="35" y="0" height="50">
			<e:skinName>
				<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
					<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="sound_off_png"/>
					<e:Label id="labelDisplay1" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
				</e:Skin>
			</e:skinName>
		</e:Button>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameTimeSkin" width="100" height="90" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="time_border" width="0" height="0" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image id="time_border_normal" source="time_border_png" width="100" height="76" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image id="time_border_red" source="time_border_red_png" width="100" height="76" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
		<e:Image source="time_s_png" x="20" y="-6" width="15" height="25"/>
		<e:Image id="time_num_1" verticalCenter="0" x="-33" width="25" height="50" source="time_3_png"/>
		<e:Image id="time_num_2" source="time_0_png" width="25" height="50" verticalCenter="0" x="-7"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameTipSkin" width="480" height="800" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="black_bg_png" width="440" height="640" horizontalCenter="0" y="100"/>
	<e:Image y="124" width="380" height="540" horizontalCenter="0" source="game_tips_png"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_close_tip" x="213" y="678" width="45" height="45">
		<e:skinName>
			<e:Skin states="up,down,disabled">
				<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="btn_tips_close_png"/>
				<e:Label id="labelDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
			</e:Skin>
		</e:skinName>
	</e:Button>
</e:Skin>
